Fabian Rosenthal graduated as M.Sc. in media technology with focus on cross-functional data science and reliable machine learning. With expertise in uncertainty quantification, performance estimation, development of statistical software and a audio engineering background. Excited to tackle new interdisciplinary challenges with robust machine learning and statistics. Loves developing, learning and evolving in a team.

## About this portfolio page
This website was built using the suggestions by Deepsha Menghani in a livestream on the [Posit YouTube channel](
https://www.youtube.com/live/xtSFXtDf4cM?si=XDfCDcQUucqpmgNz). The slides can be found [here](https://deepshamenghani.quarto.pub/portfolio-with-quarto-workshop/#/title-slide). This uses the amazing capabilities of [Quarto](https://quarto.org) to create a static website from markdown files.
